pr_title: Add support for handling 'remove_table' journal entry

timeline.message: Add support for handling 'remove_table' journal entry
Add drop table operation to involve remove_table journal entry in the journal sync test

timeline.bodyText: This line resyncs the database.. that's why the test is passing without your change. @hycsam
timeline.author: yuzhu

timeline.bodyText: @yuzhu I was expecting the old code to throw an exception (Unrecognized journal entry something) during restart, which doesn't happen. Does it run asynchronously?
timeline.author: hycsam

replies.bodyText: I remember seeing an exception being shown when running in intellij.  I am guessing it is a server side exception, which might not cause the test (client) to fail.. it might also get masked somehow.
replies.author: yuzhu

replies.bodyText: I see, thanks! I guess that means the PR is ready to merge?
replies.author: hycsam

replies.bodyText: i am ok with this PR. @gpang do you want to take another look? also, do you know why a Journal replay error does not fail the test?  I don't want this issue to happen else where and not be caught.
replies.author: yuzhu

replies.bodyText: Yeah, that is strange. I don't know why that error doesn't fail the test. In any case, we can change that part of it in a different PR.
replies.author: gpang
